name: Escape From The Universe (itch)
description:
Story:

Welcome to Adventure!

Twenty years ago, an unknown explosion occurred in the city center "Sera". After this explosion, people have begun to have difficulty in breathing. It has become impossible to live without an bell glass. While some people thought that the world was coming to an end and there was no going back, some people believed that there was still hope, and they could save the world.

People who believe that they can save the world came together and formed the L team. The duty of this team was to save the world from extinction. Their main priority was to find the source of the explosion. That's why L was doing research, collecting confidential information in places that were forbidden and dangerous to enter.

Dysis and Aramis were the researchers of the L team.  At the International Kiber Institute, which is a forbidden zone, he is tasked with collecting the fragments left over from the explosion. While Dysis and Aramis are secretly investigating the institute, they hear sirens coming from afar. Aramis and Dysis begin to flee before the cops arrive.

 Dysis and Aramis separate from each other by setting a meeting point. However, Aramis has a small accident and falls from the hill and his fan breaks. When Aramis wakes up, he sees a large passage opening in front of him. As Aramis approaches this strange passage, the passage draws him into it. Aramis finds himself in a completely different universe. Aramis sets out to search for passages in these dangerous universes in order to return home, but he has limited time because his container is broken.

Gameplay :

Space -> Jump

A -> Left

D -> Right

Team :

Art : Hümeyra Demir , Büşra Sıkar , Emre  Yüksektepe , Berk Güngör 

Developer : Güven Sarı , Yusuf Bilal Uğur
